ModMetaData.name: Yes, Vehicles, Finally!
ModMetaData.author: Mason J. Caboose, NinjaSiren
ModMetaData.description:
[v0.83 Patch #3] A true implementation of vehicles into RimWorld!
First off, a big thank you to Jecrell and Neronix, without him none of you would have this!
Second thing, thank you to Mason J. Caboose for making the original mod! I really wanted vehicles in the game, I ended up continuing this mod!
Thirdly, thank you to Hjkma for helping me fix the Combat Extended patch!
This mod is a 'simple' implementation of a truck into our lovely rim world, you can load crew, passengers, turrets, and equipment for both crossing the map and for caravanning.
To acquire a vehicle you need to research Machining and Smithing for the Vehicle Table. Here you can construct a box filled with appropriately named pieces. After following guides 1-Z on your ikea manual and throwing away the last 5 screws your pawn will have succesfully assembled a working scrap heap!
Just like any partially oiled machine, youll have to fill and power it with Chemfuel! (not included)
Upon assigning a driver, you must instruct the vehicle to draft itself for glorious duty.
==Notes and Help==
- If your goal is caravanning, please put a driver at least with good mood and no needs. - New game is optional, but maybe needed. (Old saves without this mod or updates may break game saves.) - No one else should show up on your door with any of this stuff. - You need both a gunner and a driver to fight. - Only the machine gun turret fits on the Truck and ATV. - Bugs is possibly plenty in this mod, but hopefully that it woudn't to break your game!
==Version changelog==
- Updated the armor values as per change of Combat Extended.
